repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: This collection consists of four series: professional correspondence, personal correspondence, professional publications: articles, professional publications: monographs, professional publications: reviews, other writing: fiction, other writing: poetry.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of four series: professional correspondence, personal correspondence, professional publications: articles, professional publications: monographs, professional publications: reviews, other writing: fiction, other writing: poetry.

Some of the publications with issues included in this collection: Industrial & Labor Relations Review, The Right to Work, Labour Education in the British Caribbean , Daedalus Perspectives on Business, The Journal of Human Resources, Labour Gazette, Symposium, Management in the XXI Century, The Hermes Exchange, The Columbia Journal of World Business, Business Horizons, Columbia Law Review, Industrial News Letter, The Journal of Political Economy, Brooklyn Law Review, The Accounting Review, Business & Society Review, Monthly Labor Review, Industrial & Labor Relations Review.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Neil W. Chamberlain Papers #6233. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
